abstract: Ken Jaworowski reviews Frida and Lasse Barkfors documentary film Pervert Park.

headline.print_headline: Review: ‘Pervert Park’ Presents Sex Offenders in Their Own Words
headline.main: Review: ‘Pervert Park’ Presents Sex Offenders in Their Own Words

snippet: By showing these men and women, who live in their own trailer park, struggling with their demons, this documentary evokes a mix of revulsion and pity.
lead_paragraph: By showing these men and women, who live in their own trailer park, struggling with their demons, this documentary evokes a mix of revulsion and pity.
